column4: Help! I'm getting ata errors from the kernel. I did a quick SMART test from my BIOS and got negative results (No errors.) fsck found and fixed many many many ext2 errors, but the problms still persist. Need help.Here is my dmesg output: http://paste.ubuntu.com/88830/
Is no one going to help me?
